summary: Completed comprehensive testing of GO FISH! fishing adventure game. Backend API working excellently (91.7% success rate), frontend UI functional with all major features working. Character creation, adventure mode, fishing gameplay, and stage selection all operational.

minor_bugs.issue: Expects query parameter instead of JSON body for level value
minor_bugs.impact: User progression API call format mismatch

ui_bugs.issue: SettingsPanel component is not defined - ReferenceError when clicking Settings button

passed_tests: Main menu loads with GO FISH! title and buttons
ENTER WORLD button opens Adventure Mode successfully
Character creation 4-step flow: Gender → Background → Appearance → Name
QUICK FISH button opens Stage Select with 4 stages + Tutorial
Selecting Sunny Lake starts fishing gameplay
CAST button is visible and clickable
User management, weather, achievements, leaderboard all working
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix SettingsPanel component definition error - component is referenced but not defined in App.js. Also fix user level API endpoint to accept JSON body instead of query parameter.
